EmailTemplate.name: Swimming Gala Update
EmailTemplate.subject: Swimming Gala Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
Please send your children to school with two towels tomorrow for the swimming gala. The children will be in and out of the pool a few times during the event and they will need a dry towel for the end.
We also recommend bringing an individual and easily identifiable top to wear on poolside.
PE Team The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
